title: How do I level up on the Boards?
body: I don't know a lot of things about boards and I wanted to upvote on a post but it said I needed to be lvl 7... My account is lvl 30 and I don't get it. Do I have to level up on the boards? or is it a bug?

replies.body: Some accounts need to sync to the boards, mostly when posting for the first time.  It does look like everything is sync'd up now!
